amendment.description: To increase the employment of Americans by requiring State workforce agencies to certify that employers are actively recruiting Americans and that Americans are not qualified or available to fill the positions that the employer seeks to fill with H-2B nonimmigrants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1237 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1237 proposed by Senator Merkley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1237 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1237 proposed by Senator Merkley.
